Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of The Human Meteor
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the comic book title and the main character, The Human Meteor, along with the initial underwater setting and premise.

sub_scenes.title: Page 1: Underwater Introduction
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of the comic title, main character, and initial underwater setting with divers.

Major_Arcs.title: Duke's Taxi and the G-Man Chase
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to Duke's civilian life as a taxi driver, his encounter with rich playboys, and the sudden pursuit of a G-Man's car, leading to his transformation.

sub_scenes.title: Page 2: Duke's Taxi Ride
sub_scenes.description: Duke's taxi ride to the waterfront with wealthy passengers.

narrative_arcs.title: Duke's Taxi Ride to the Waterfront

sub_scenes.title: Page 2: The G-Man's Car Chase Initiation
sub_scenes.description: Duke transforms into Human Meteor to chase a suspicious G-Man's car.

Major_Arcs.title: Human Meteor's Confrontation and Stowaway Plan
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers Human Meteor's confrontation with the G-Men, subsequent recovery, and Duke's plan to infiltrate the yacht using Toby.

sub_scenes.title: Page 3: Confrontation and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor confronts suspects, followed by appreciation from police and recovery in hospital.

sub_scenes.title: Page 3: Duke's Stowaway Plan
sub_scenes.description: Duke plans to infiltrate the yacht using Toby as a stowaway.

Major_Arcs.title: Yacht Incident and Submarine Plot Twist
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the events on the yacht, including the playboys' punishment, the cabin trap, Duke's realization of a setup, and the revelation of Toby's true role and the submarine plot.

sub_scenes.title: Page 4: Yacht Deck and Cabin Trap
sub_scenes.description: Playboys working on the yacht deck and one falling victim to a trap in Pete's cabin.

narrative_arcs.title: Yacht Deck Work and Cabin Trap

sub_scenes.title: Page 4: Duke's Suspicion
sub_scenes.description: Duke realizes he might have been lured into a setup.

sub_scenes.title: Page 4: Toby's True Role and Submarine Plot
sub_scenes.description: Toby's allegiance is revealed, and the submarine plot is introduced.

narrative_arcs.title: Submarine Plot and Toby's True Role

Major_Arcs.title: Underwater Investigation and Torpedo Operation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers Human Meteor's underwater reconnaissance, the discovery of the sunken submarine, the torpedo plot revelation, and the divers' operation inside the submarine, leading to confrontation.

sub_scenes.title: Page 5: Human Meteor's Recon and Divers' Arrival
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor's underwater reconnaissance and the arrival of divers.

sub_scenes.title: Page 5: Sunken Submarine and Diver Observation
sub_scenes.description: Discovery of the sunken submarine and diver noticing Human Meteor.

sub_scenes.title: Page 6: Underwater Confrontation with Divers
sub_scenes.description: Initial encounter and escalating hostility between Human Meteor and divers, leading to chaos.

narrative_arcs.title: Divers' Initial Encounter with Human Meteor
Human Meteor's Intervention and Divers' Hostility
Human Meteor's Threat and Divers' Retaliation

Major_Arcs.title: Underwater Attack and Yacht Investigation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Human Meteor/Namor's underwater attack on the submarine plot, the ship's reaction, and Duke's investigation on the yacht.

sub_scenes.title: Page 7: Namor's Underwater Attack
sub_scenes.description: Namor prepares and executes an underwater attack.

sub_scenes.title: Page 7: Shipboard Reaction and Escape
sub_scenes.description: Ship crew's reaction to the explosion and attempt to escape.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of Peter's Condition on Ship
Namor's Determined Final Attack and Ship Crew's Fear

sub_scenes.title: Page 8: Yacht Confrontation and Investigation
sub_scenes.description: Duke pursues to the yacht, confronts Peter, and searches for the depth map.

narrative_arcs.title: Search for the Depth Map in Peter's Cabin
Exposing Peter's Treachery to the Officer

Major_Arcs.title: Resolution and Transition
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc resolves the immediate crisis, showing recovery and setting up the next phase of action with Toby and Holden.

sub_scenes.title: Page 8: Fast Travel and Hospital Visit
sub_scenes.description: Rapid travel and visit to Holden in hospital.

narrative_arcs.title: Evening Reflection after a Chaotic Day
Toby's Home and Invitation to Visit Holden

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads Flashback
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc presents a brief flashback scene focusing on the Liberty Lads in action against Nazis.

sub_scenes.title: Page 9: Liberty Lads Action
sub_scenes.description: Liberty Lads fighting against Nazi fiends.

narrative_arcs.title: Liberty Lads in Action Against Nazis

Major_Arcs.title: Ambulance and Bus Garage Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to a new mystery involving an ambulance, a dropped wallet, and events at a bus garage, focusing on Skip and Chuck's investigation.

sub_scenes.title: Page 9: Ambulance Arrival and Observation
sub_scenes.description: Ambulance arrival and Skip and Chuck observing.

sub_scenes.title: Page 10: Dropped Wallet and Bus Garage Lead
sub_scenes.description: Discovery of a dropped wallet and a bus garage address.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dropped Wallet and the Bus Garage Address
Marine Salutes a Civilian - Major Bronson

sub_scenes.title: Page 11: Bus Garage Confrontation and Abduction
sub_scenes.description: Confrontation with police and abduction by Mr. Horst at the bus garage.

sub_scenes.title: Page 12: Interrogation and Bronson's Arrival
sub_scenes.description: Interrogation by Mr. Horst and the arrival of Major Bronson.

sub_scenes.title: Page 13: Office Fight and Escape
sub_scenes.description: Office fight, threats, betrayal, and escape order.

Major_Arcs.title: Escape, Sabotage Discovery, and Marine Response
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Skip and Chuck's escape, discovery of sabotage plans, and the Marines' intervention.

sub_scenes.title: Page 14: Seeking Help and Marine Contact
sub_scenes.description: Skip seeks help while Chuck is approached by a Marine Sergeant.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of Sabotage Plans in Secret Office

sub_scenes.title: Page 15: Marine Barracks and Office Combat
sub_scenes.description: Marine response and office fight involving Skip and Major Bronson.

sub_scenes.title: Page 16: Marine Arrival and Victory
sub_scenes.description: Marines arrive, engage in combat, rescue Major Bronson, and achieve victory.

narrative_arcs.title: Resolution and Victory Over Nazi Spies

Major_Arcs.title: Introduction to The Champ and South American Intrigue
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces 'The Champ' and Henry and sets up a new storyline in South America involving Nazi spies and a kidnapping.

sub_scenes.title: Page 17: Introduction of The Champ and Setting
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of The Champ and Henry and the Nazi threat.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Henry and the Nazi Threat
Setting the Scene in South America and the Soldiers' Search
Confrontation and Fight in the Desert

sub_scenes.title: Page 18: Interrogation and Escape Decision
sub_scenes.description: Soldiers' interrogation and Champ and Henry decide to escape and seek help.

narrative_arcs.title: Escape and the Decision to Seek the American Consul
Explanation of Suspicion: Rosita's Kidnapping and El Tigre

Major_Arcs.title: El Tigre's Kidnapping and Rescue Plan
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the kidnapping of Rosita by El Tigre, the misunderstanding leading to a confrontation, and the subsequent plan to rescue her.

sub_scenes.title: Page 19: Kidnapping Scene
sub_scenes.description: Forced entry into a car and suspicious car ride led by a bald man.

narrative_arcs.title: Forced Entry into Car and Commanded Drive
Suspicious Car Ride and Destination Order

sub_scenes.title: Page 20: Rescue Planning and Infiltration
sub_scenes.description: Planning to confront El Tigre and infiltration of his hideout using stage dollars.

narrative_arcs.title: Preparation for Action on Tamale Street
Infiltration of El Tigre's Hideout with Stage Dollars

sub_scenes.title: Page 21: Confrontation and Search for Rosita
sub_scenes.description: Confrontation, garbage bin incident, search for Rosita, and interrogation of El Tigre.

narrative_arcs.title: Searching for Rosita and Threatening El Tigre

sub_scenes.title: Page 22: News of Rosita and Rescue Mission
sub_scenes.description: Accusations against Tigre, news of Rosita's imprisonment, and urgent departure for rescue.

narrative_arcs.title: Ride to Headquarters and Rescue Resolve

Major_Arcs.title: Rosita's Rescue and Aftermath
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the rescue operation itself, the combat, Rosita's rescue, and the subsequent celebration.

sub_scenes.title: Page 23: Rescue Operation in Progress
sub_scenes.description: Horseback pursuit, forced entry, citadel escape strategy, and rapid advance.

narrative_arcs.title: Citadel Escape and Rear Entrance Strategy

sub_scenes.title: Page 24: Climax of Rescue and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: Fight preparations, physical combat, machine gun threat, Rosita's rescue and gratitude, and government arrival.

narrative_arcs.title: Machine Gun Deployment and Rosita's Intervention

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan's Jungle Mission and Betrayal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to Devil Dog Dolan's story in the jungle, his combat, capture, and the acquisition of plans under duress.

sub_scenes.title: Page 25: Jungle Combat and Reporting
sub_scenes.description: Jungle combat involving Devil Dog Dolan and subsequent reporting to superiors.

narrative_arcs.title: Jungle Combat with Devil Dog Dolan

sub_scenes.title: Page 26: Jungle Exploration and Ambush
sub_scenes.description: Dolan's jungle entrance, exploration, and ambush by natives.

sub_scenes.title: Page 27: Capture, Coercion, and Plan Acquisition
sub_scenes.description: Rescue from fire, suspicion, orders for plans, torture, and plan handover.

narrative_arcs.title: Note Writing and Plan Negotiation under Duress
Devil Dog's Recovery and Plan Acquisition

sub_scenes.title: Page 28: Arson, Marine Attack, and Dolan's Fate
sub_scenes.description: Dolan's arson, marine attack, Sam's bravery, and Dolan's capture.

narrative_arcs.title: Native Huts Ablaze Amidst Marine Assault

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan Jungle Fight and New Alliance
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shows Dolan's return to the jungle, confrontation with natives, the Chief's accidental death, and the unexpected alliance with the native tribe.

sub_scenes.title: Page 29: Jungle Confrontation and Chief's Death
sub_scenes.description: Dolan's jungle entrance, fight with natives, and accidental death of the Chief.

narrative_arcs.title: Dolan's Jungle Entrance and Initial Encounter
Fight with Natives and Chief's Demise
Grauer's Dialogue with Native and Alliance

Major_Arcs.title: Captain's Dilemma and Dolan's Discipline
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc resolves the Dolan storyline with the Captain's difficult decision, Sam's attack, and Dolan receiving discipline despite recognition of his deed.

sub_scenes.title: Page 30: Captain's Decision and Attack on Sam
sub_scenes.description: Captain's dilemma, Grauer's demands, and an attack on Sam.

narrative_arcs.title: Shore Leave Rescinded and Dolan's Discipline

Major_Arcs.title: Introduction to the Twinkle Twins Story
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the new storyline focusing on the Twinkle Twins and their fight against ruthless killers.

sub_scenes.title: Page 31: Twinkle Twins Introduction
sub_scenes.description: Narrator introduces the Twinkle Twins and their mission.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction to the Twinkle Twins Story

Major_Arcs.title: Twinkle Twins Burgess Murder Investigation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc initiates the Twinkle Twins' investigation into the Burgess murder case, from the newspaper office briefing to the hospital visit.

sub_scenes.title: Page 32: Newspaper Office Briefing
sub_scenes.description: Briefing at the Weston Call newspaper about the Burgess murder.

narrative_arcs.title: Newspaper Office Briefing on Burgess Murder
Police Station Inquiry about Reilly's Skip

sub_scenes.title: Page 33: Blood Revelation and Farnacci Lead
sub_scenes.description: Doctor's blood revelation and the Twins follow the Farnacci lead.

narrative_arcs.title: Candy Store Phone Call to Elijah about Farnacci
Decision to Locate Tom Reilly in Irish Section

sub_scenes.title: Page 34: Irish Section Search and Mrs. Murphy's Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Search in Irish section leads to Mrs. Murphy and crucial information about Reilly and Farnacci.

narrative_arcs.title: Searching for Tom Reilly in the Irish Section
Mrs. Murphy's Revelation about Reilly and Farnacci

Major_Arcs.title: Twinkle Twins Chase, Gangster Arrest, and Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the Twinkle Twins storyline, featuring the chase after Reilly, gangster confrontation and arrest, and the resolution with Reilly's recovery and Farnacci's imprisonment.

sub_scenes.title: Page 35: Chase and Blockade
sub_scenes.description: Reilly's escape, Diane's pursuit, and Irish neighborhood blockade.

narrative_arcs.title: Reilly's Coal Chute Escape and Diane's Pursuit

sub_scenes.title: Page 36: Medical Emergency and Community Help
sub_scenes.description: Police departure, ambulance arrival for shooting, hospital transport, and community blood donation.

narrative_arcs.title: Ambulance Transport and Concern for Victims
Failed Blood Donation Match and Community Appeal

sub_scenes.title: Page 37: Blood Transfusion and Recovery
sub_scenes.description: Community blood donation, transfusion process, Reilly's recovery, and anticipation of revelations.

narrative_arcs.title: Urgent Call for Blood and Community Response

sub_scenes.title: Page 38: Farnacci's Arrest and Birthday Celebration
sub_scenes.description: Decision to arrest Farnacci, police raid, arrest, and birthday celebration marking resolution.

narrative_arcs.title: Decision to Arrest Farnacci and Police Action
Police Raid on Poolroom and Arrest
